idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

descript.abstract:
The MPCA's What's in My Neighborhood contains a wide variety of environmental information about your community. This includes potentially contaminated sites, permits, licenses, registrations, inspections, and closed enforcement activities.
Potentially contaminated sites: Since the early 1980s when major federal and state cleanup programs were created, the MPCA has been aggressively searching for and helping to clean up contaminated properties, from very small to large. This website contains a searchable inventory of those properties, as well as sites that have already been cleaned up and those currently being investigated or cleaned up.
Environmental permits and registrations: This Web application also contains a searchable inventory of businesses that have applied for and received different types of environmental permits and registrations from the MPCA.
Methods for creating site locations have different levels of precision. The most accurate locations use coordinates from GPS (global positioning system). Coordinates are also derived using the site's street address, zip code or public land survey information. Some MPCA sites are not mapped. These are generally activities that are mobile, like ships with ballast water permits.
descript.purpose: The data set was created as part of the Minnesota Pollution Control Agency's What's in My Neighborhood web application, which allows for public access to sites with environmental cleanup, pollution prevention, permitted, registered, or licensed activities.

timeperd.current: Site locations and attributes are updated on a continual basis as new information is obtained. Data in the distributed data files is current as of the creation date of the file.

theme.themekey: mpca, environment, permit, registration, license, cleanup, superfund, RCRA, CERCLIS, brownfield, tank, leak, spill, NPDES, SDS, feedlot, landfill, solid waste, hazardous waste, dump, stormwater, MS4, environmental review, remediation, wastewater, toxics reduction, permit, MPCA, registration, notification, investigation, contaminated property

idinfo.useconst: Redistribution Conditions: If you obtain data from the MPCA, it is understood that you and/or your organization have the right to use them for any purpose. If you transmit or provide these data in any form to another user, the data should be accompanied by all documentation provided with the original data set including the full metadata record.

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

stdorder.ordering: This data can be downloaded from the Minnesota Geospatial Commons at:https://gisdata.mn.gov/dataset/env-my-neighborhood

distinfo.distliab:
Limitations: Although extensive effort has been made to produce error-free and complete data, all geographic information has limitations due to the scale, resolution, date and interpretation of the original source materials. Users should consult available data documentation (metadata) for this particular data to determine limitations and the precision to which the data depict distance, direction, location or other geographic characteristics. Data may be subject to change without prior notification.
No warranty: Data is provided "as is," without any warranty whatsoever, including but not limited to any warranty as to performance, merchantability or fitness for any particular purpose.
Liability: The entire risk as to the results of the use of this data is assumed by the user. The MPCA is not responsible for any interpretation or conclusions made by those who acquire or use it. The MPCA shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, special, incidental, compensatory or consequential damages or third-party claims resulting from the use of this data, even if the MPCA has been advised of the possibility of such potential loss or damage. In states that do not allow the exclusion or limitation of incidental or consequential damages, this data may not be used.

spdoinfo.indspref:
Latitude and Longitude columns contain values expressed as geographic coordinates in decimal degrees, using WGS84 as the spheroid/datum.
EPSG:4326

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attr.attrdef: Internal feature number

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated. Not consistent across different versions of the data.

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry
The site's system ID
The site's name
Indicates whether site is active or not ('Y' or 'N')
Street address of physical location of site
City of physical location of site
State of physical location of site
Zip Code of physical location of site
City in which site is located - derived from feature location
County in which site is located - derived from feature location
US Congressional district code - derived from feature location
MN senate district - derived from feature location
MN house district - derived from feature location
USGS 8-digit watershed code - derived from feature location
Name of MN DNR major watershed associated with the USGS 8-digit watershed
URL for MPCA What's In My Neighborhood application page for this site
MPCA activity of interest at the site
Comma-delimited list of MPCA activities of interest at the site
MPCA ID associated with an activity at the site
Comma-delimited list of MPCA IDs associated with activities at the site
Comma-delimited list of codes for programs associated with activities at the site
Name of the MPCA program associated with activities at the site
Comma-delimited list of names of MPCA programs associated with activities at the site
Primary industrial classification associated with the site
indicates the presence of institutional controls at the site. ('Y' or 'N') These are administrative and legal controls that help minimize the potential for human exposure to contamination.
decimal degrees - coordinate y value (WGS84)
decimal degrees - coordinate x value (WGS84)
code representing the method used to derive the location coordinates
Description of the method used to derive the location coordinates

dataqual.complete: At this time, this data set does not contain a feature for every site in the What's In My Neighborhood application. There is an ongoing effort to improve data completeness and quality.

attracc.attraccr:
Attribute information comes from multiple sources, including information submitted by the site owner, information determined by MPCA staff, and information derived based on the location of the site.
The accuracy of this information has not been verified.

dataqual.logic: No known issues with logical consistency for this point data set.

horizpa.horizpar:
Coordinates for these features were collected using a variety of methods of varying accuracy. The 'COORD_METH' column in the attribute table describes the method used to determine the coordinate for each feature.
A description of the coordinate collection values found in the 'COORD_METH' column can be found in the 'Attributes' section of this document.

vertacc.vertaccr: Not applicable. The features in this data set do not contain Z (vertical) values.

procstep.procdesc:
Coordinates for these features were collected using a variety of methods of varying accuracy. The 'COORD_METH' column in the attribute table describes the method used to determine the coordinate for each feature.
A description of the coordinate collection values found in the 'COORD_METH' column can be found in the 'Entities and Attributes' section of this document.
